abstracts.cdata!:
This technical assistance project has
            three objectives. First, it is intended to strengthen the
            Government's capacity to carry out its economic
            recovery program. Second, a strategy will be developed to
            assist with the improvement of the country's presently
            deteriorating natural environment. Finally, the project will
            aid manufacturing enterprises that have been affected by the
            ongoing trade.  To this end, the project entails  1) public
            sector management support including assistance in the
            programming, control and monitoring of public expenditures;
            2) studies to be initiated to assess the degradation of
            Haiti's natural environment; and 3) assessment and
            support of the restructuring and development needs of
            private industry to facilitate adaption to recent trade
            reforms; and, 4) other related studies to be researched.
